short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert text to URL or slug and copy functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Textrl is a powerful Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of converting plain text into URL-friendly slugs. It offers a convenient and efficient way to improve the readability and search engine optimization (SEO) of your content effortlessly.

Key Features:

Text to URL Conversion: Textrl empowers users to transform any text, such as article titles, headlines, or product names, into SEO-friendly URL slugs. By automatically replacing spaces and special characters with hyphens, Textrl ensures that your URLs are both user-friendly and search engine-friendly.

Clipboard Copy Functionality: Textrl includes a copy-to-clipboard feature, allowing users to quickly copy the converted text or word/character count results with a single click. This feature streamlines the process of transferring content to other applications or platforms.

Why Choose Textrl:

User-Friendly: Textrl is incredibly easy to use, making it accessible to users of all skill levels.
Time-Saving: Textrl simplifies tasks that can be time-consuming when done manually, such as generating URL slugs or counting words and characters.
SEO Benefits: By generating SEO-friendly slugs, Textrl helps improve the visibility of web content in search engine results, ultimately driving more organic traffic to your website.
Versatile: Textrl is a versatile tool suitable for bloggers, content marketers, web developers, and anyone who needs to manage and optimize text content online.

Textrl is the go-to Chrome extension for content creators and webmasters seeking to enhance their content's SEO performance while saving time and effort. Streamline your content creation process and boost your online presence with Textrl today!
